text: During the 1966–67 season Hearts competed in the Scottish First Division, the Scottish Cup and the Scottish League Cup. == Fixtures == === Friendlies === === League Cup === === Scottish Cup === === Scottish First Division === == See also == *List of Heart of Midlothian F.C. seasons == References == *Statistical Record 66-67 == External links == *Official Club website Category:Heart of Midlothian F.C. seasons Heart of Midlothian
title: 1966–67 Heart of Midlothian F.C. season
